snippet.title: Let's Play Real Play Puzzlesphere with the Sphere Controller (PS2) Gameplay
snippet.description:
Let's Play Real Play Puzzlesphere using the specialized Sphere Controller. This is played on PlayStation 2

You can watch my review on the Real Play Puzzlesphere Controller here:
https://youtu.be/cdUxoylGdi8

----------------------------------------------------------------
Please Like and Subscribe!

- I will be releasing new videos every week, so be sure to subscribe and enable notifications so you don't miss any of my new videos!

---------------------------------------------------------------
Want to support my channel? 

- Then click "Join" and become a member today. There are two tiers with Member Only monthly perks. I appreciate the extra support, so thanks in advance if you decide to join!  

- You can also support me via a Super Thanks by clicking the “Thanks” button below the video, choose your $ amount and then you can leave a colorful personalized comment that will stand out in the comments section. 

----------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my channel! 

- If you enjoyed this video, then check out my channel. I have hundreds of videos uploaded already!  And many more to come! New videos every week!

Sharkie’s Gaming Controllers
https://www.youtube.com/c/SharkiesGamingControllers

Sharkie’s Gaming Controllers is dedicated to the showcasing of Gaming Controllers & Accessories for a wide variety of gaming systems. From Vintage to modern controllers, you'll see them all here. I have over 1500 Gaming Controllers & Accessories in my collections so many more videos to come! 

----------------------------------------------------------------
Interested in Gaming Replicas or Collectables?

Check out my 2nd Channel:
Sharkie’s Gaming Replicas & Collectables
https://www.youtube.com/c/SharkiesGamingReplicasCollectables

----------------------------------------------------------------

This video contains gameplay from the PS2 game Real Play Puzzlesphere. There is commentary and a dedicated "Controller" Cam overlaid onto the captured footage. Purpose of this video is to showcase the Sphere Controller in action with Real Play Puzzlesphere game.  

----------------------------------------------------------------

Intro/Outro Music is “Hibernation” produced by Traffic 
(This is royalty free music under Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 license)
You can find his music here:
Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/trafficofficial
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/MusicTraffic
